item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Great point! I will be sure to upload images that are much larger in case people want to blow it up and check out the details. Thanks for the advice and glad you enjoyed the review!
item.content:encoded: Great point! I will be sure to upload images that are much larger in case people want to blow it up and check out the details. Thanks for the advice and glad you enjoyed the review!

item.title: By: pollylop
item.dc:creator: pollylop
item.description: Looks a perfect portable, thanks for the review Ben. Hey something I've thought about mentioning before but particularly now that your in full swing review mode, larger images where more detail can be seen would be a nice bonus (think you can make it so you can keep them the smaller size on your page but then when we click the image boom FULL SCALE). Anyway just a thought. Continue to enjoy your observations around this awesome game, keep up the good work! :D
item.content:encoded: Looks a perfect portable, thanks for the review Ben. Hey something I’ve thought about mentioning before but particularly now that your in full swing review mode, larger images where more detail can be seen would be a nice bonus (think you can make it so you can keep them the smaller size on your page but then when we click the image boom FULL SCALE). Anyway just a thought. Continue to enjoy your observations around this awesome game, keep up the good work! ðŸ˜€
